author: dnash86
body:
This PR includes all the code for inclusion of ME0 in STA muon reco.  It has been tested with "runTheMatrix.py --job-reports -j 8 -s -l 1306.0,101.0,1003.0,50202.0,9.0,25202.0", and some output root files were checked for equivalence with an unmodified IB.  Please check for any changes that need to be made and any additional tests that should be performed.  

Thanks a lot.
title: ME0 in STA muon reco for 80X
